org.gradoop.flink.model.api.layouts

Interface GraphCollectionLayoutFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseLayoutFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GVECollectionLayoutFactory, IndexedGVECollectionLayoutFactory, TxCollectionLayoutFactory

    public interface GraphCollectionLayoutFactory
extends BaseLayoutFactory
    Enables the construction of a GraphCollectionLayout.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

        Returns:

      • fromTransactions

        GraphCollectionLayout fromTransactions(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> transactions)
        Creates a graph collection layout from a graph transaction dataset. Overlapping vertices and edge are merged by Id comparison only.
        Parameters:
        transactions - transaction dataset
        Returns:
        graph collection layout

      • fromTransactions

        GraphCollectionLayout fromTransactions(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> transactions,
                                       org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<Vertex,Vertex> vertexMergeReducer,
                                       org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.GroupReduceFunction<Edge,Edge> edgeMergeReducer)
        Creates a graph collection layout from graph transactions. Overlapping vertices and edge are merged using provided reduce functions.
        Parameters:
        transactions - transaction dataset
        vertexMergeReducer - vertex merge function
        edgeMergeReducer - edge merge function
        Returns:
        graph collection layout

      • createEmptyCollection

        GraphCollectionLayout createEmptyCollection()
        Creates an empty graph collection layout.
        Returns:
        empty graph collection layout
